text: (napiye! Nir ivvetattai otiya camayattil) umakkuc cevicayppavarkalaip pol iruntu piraku, um'mai vittu velippattatum, (nampikkaiyalarkalakiya, ivveta) nanam kotukkappattavarkalai nokki(p parikacamaka ‘‘unkal napi) carru mun enna kurinar?'' Enak ketpavarkalum avarkalil palar irukkinranar. Ittakaiyavarkalin ullankal mitu allah muttiraiyittu vittan. (Atalal,) ivarkal tankal carira iccaiyaittan pinparri natakkinranar
